title: Saturn Recipe
full_text:
Saturn Recipe
Close

Prep
5 mins

Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
lemon juice
1/2
ounce
passionfruit syrup
(such as BG Reynolds)
1/4
ounce
falernum
1/4
ounce
orgeat syrup
(such as Small Hand Foods)
1 1/4
ounces
gin
1
cup
crushed
ice
Directions
Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour unstrained into a tall glass, garnish as desired.
Special equipment
blender
Gin
Summer Drinks
